title: AvP2 Team Fortress mod, v1.01, noinstall (Vista users)
description:
Component: Team Fortress mod
Summary: modified attribute files, crosshairs, sounds, models and code
to provide new game modes and abilities
Author: The AvP2 Team Fortress group
Email: <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="7c1b1d0e131219444c3c051d141313521f1311">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">
/* <![CDATA[ */!function(){try{var t="currentScript"in document?document.currentScript:function(){for(var t=document.getElementsByTagName("script"),e=t.length;e--;)if(t[e].getAttribute("cf-hash"))return t[e]}();if(t&&t.previousSibling){var e,r,n,i,c=t.previousSibling,a=c.getAttribute("data-cfemail");if(a){for(e="",r=parseInt(a.substr(0,2),16),n=2;a.length-n;n+=2)i=parseInt(a.substr(n,2),16)^r,e+=String.fromCharCode(i);e=document.createTextNode(e),c.parentNode.replaceChild(e,c)}}}catch(u){}}();/* ]]> */</script>
Build Date: 2008-10-05
Version: 1.01

WARNING:
Changes made to the attribute files will prevent clients running this mod
to join servers which do not have it installed and loaded.

Description:
============
"However, this is AvP2 Fortress, so everything should have an AvP2 twist to it.
Like Preds and Aliens on the teams realistically, but not whorishly. No Predator
rocket-launcher guys, for example, but a Predator as the Spy, a class that&#039;s
supposed to cloak and primarily use a knife anyway."
SMID

"But this, we want this to be the defining point in AvP2 modding. Half-life has
counterstrike, Quake had Team Fortress, but AvP2 never really had its killer mod
and that saddens me. I will do whatever it takes to help make this happen, and I
want to do it before Fox throws us under the truck."
TheOracle

Known issues:
=============
- when joining or starting a game for the first time, if no character was
selected before joining, the character type is undetermined.
- the ladder from the blue base (&#039;Our Collective Fate&#039;) that links the
undergrond section to the blue base can block players. In such a case,
simlply jump down and try climbing it by pressing the jump key.

Requirements:
=============
1. Aliens vs. Predator 2 installed

Installation:
=============
1) Before unpacking the archive in your AvP2 folder, please back up the
following files:
- AvP2Serv.exe
- ServerDataunnamed.txt
You can do that by either renaming them as "Vanilla_AvP2Serv.exe" and
"Vanilla_unnamed.txt" or by moving them into a backup folder.
2) unpack the archive in your game folder.

Uninstall:
==========
1) delete the AVP2FORTRESS.REZ, AvP2Serv.exe and ServerDataunnamed.txt files
from your game folder
2) restore the original versions of AvP2Serv.exe and ServerDataunnamed.txt from
the backups made before installation of the mod. 

To start the mod, simply double click the AvP2Fortress.bat file.

Licensing and Copyright notes:
==============================
AvP2 Fortress must be distributed solely for free. Neither you nor any other person
or party may sell them to anyone, commercially exploit them in any way, or charge
anyone for using them. You may exchange them at no charge among other end-users, as
long as the original ZIP file remains unchanged.

You may use the mod&#039;s game assets (specifically the added models, skins, .pcx
files, the compiled binaries and textures) in your AvP2 mods only. 

History:
========

1.01 - Corrected a server resources bug, that caused a CTF or 1F-CTF game mode server
to send out wrong game type descriptions, thus making them invisible to
clients.

1.0 - First release.
